item.title: Understanding DevOps
item.description: DevOps is a set of practices that combines software development (Dev) and information technology operations (Ops) which aims to shorten the systems development life cycle and provide continuous delivery with high software quality. DevOps is a culture, a movement, and a way of working. It is a set of practices that combines software development (Dev) and information technology operations (Ops) which aims to shorten the systems development life cycle and provide continuous delivery with high software quality.
